backend/main.mo: Defines actor with access control, user profiles, shops, products, carts, bargaining, and messaging logic using persistent maps and authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence report listing features, related frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides a mapping of frontend file paths to concise summaries describing each component or page’s purpose.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes with custom color system and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the root element and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider, layout, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Renders footer with branding, copyright, and link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with navigation, login button, mobile menu, and conditional authenticated links.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout component providing header, footer, and page content container.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication guard showing a login prompt when user is unauthenticated and children when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/BargainRequestFo: A dialog form allowing authenticated users to submit bargain offers with price and optional notes using a mutation.
frontend/src/components/BestDealRequestB: Button that sends a prefilled 'best deal' bargain request if the user is authenticated.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication states and clearing cached queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity with helpers for login, logout, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for user profiles, products, shops, cart items, and mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining a warm earth‑tone theme with light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Cart page that loads cart items and product data, displays them with subtotal calculation, and handles loading or empty states.
frontend/src/pages/MessagesThreadPage.ts: Displays a product-specific chat thread, loading messages, showing errors, and allowing authenticated users to send new messages.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed product and shop info, supports adding items to cart, messaging shopkeepers, and handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/ShopDiscoveryPage.tsx: Lists products with shop info for browsing, includes a hero section, error handling, and navigation to product or seller pages.
frontend/src/pages/ShopkeeperProductsPag: Allows shopkeepers to view and manage their own products, including creating new listings via a modal form.
frontend/src/pages/ShopkeeperProfileForm: Provides a form for creating a shop profile with validation and submits data to backend before redirecting.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrors.ts: Normalizes backend errors into user-friendly messages and detects authentication-related errors.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Formats bigint price values in cents into human‑readable USD currency strings.
frontend/src/utils/phoneLinks.ts: Generates WhatsApp and telephone links by cleaning phone numbers into valid deep‑link formats.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read URL and hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear stored or hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the ICP dapp scaffold, existing features, and planned enhancements for backend, frontend, and UX components.
